title: Which of Tapestry's (NYSE: TPR) brands (Coach, Kate Spade, Stuart Weitzman) saw the greatest growth in total square footage in NA from FY 2022 to FY 2024? Express the answer by stating the brand name and its corresponding growth, in square feet (ex: Stuart Weitzman; X sq ft).
description:
1) Find Tapestry's average square footage by brand for fiscal years 2022 and 2024. Using Tapestry's 2024 10-K and its "avg. square footage" table: 
 Coach 2022: 4,839
 Coach 2024: 4,905 
 Kate Spade 2022: 2,863
 Kate Spade 2024: 2949
 Stuart Weitzman 2022: 1,919
 Stuart Weitzman 2024: 1,938
  
 2) Find Tapestry's store count by brand for fiscal years 2022 and 2024. Using Tapestry's 2024 10-K and its "store count" table: 
 Coach 2022: 343
 Coach 2024: 324 
 Kate Spade 2022: 207
 Kate Spade 2024: 197
 Stuart Weitzman 2022: 39
 Stuart Weitzman 2024: 34
 
 3) Calculate Tapestry's total square footage by brand for fiscal years 2022 and 2024 by multiplying average square footage by store count for each respective brand and year. 
 Coach 2022: 4,839 x 343 = 1,659,777
 Coach 2024: 4,905 x 324 = 1,589,220
 Kate Spade 2022: 2,863 x 207 = 592,641
 Kate Spade 2024: 2949 x 197 = 580,953
 Stuart Weitzman 2022: 1,919 x 39 = 74,841
 Stuart Weitzman 2024: 1,938 x 34 = 65,892
 
 4) Calculate the difference in total square footage between FY 2022 and FY 2024 for each of Tapestry's brands. 
 Coach: 1,589,220 - 1,659,777 = - 70,557
 Kate Spade: 580,953 - 592,641 = -11,688
 Stuart Weitzman: 65,892 - 74,841 = -8,949
 
 5) Identify the brand with the greatest growth in total square footage from FY 2022 to FY 2024. In this case, since all 3 brands saw a decline in total square footage, choose the brand with the smallest decline. Final answer: "Stuart Weitzman; -8,949 sq ft".

rubric.criteria: Retrieve Coach's average square footage for FY 2022: 4,839
Retrieve Coach's average square footage for FY 2024: 4,905
Retrieve Kate Spade's average square footage for FY 2022: 2,863
Retrieve Kate Spade's average square footage for FY 2024: 2,949
Retrieve Stuart Weitzman's average square footage for FY 2022: 1,919
Retrieve Stuart Weitzman's average square footage for FY 2024: 1,938
Retrieve Coach's store count for FY 2022: 343
Retrieve Coach's store count for FY 2024: 324
Retrieve Kate Spade's store count for FY 2022: 207
Retrieve Kate Spade's store count for FY 2024: 197
Retrieve Stuart Weitzman's store count for FY 2022: 39
Retrieve Stuart Weitzman's store count for FY 2024: 34
Calculate Coach's total square footage in FY 2022: 4,839 x 343 = 1,659,777
Calculate Coach's total square footage in FY 2024: 4,905 x 324 = 1,589,220
Calculate Kate Spade's total square footage in FY 2022: 2,863 x 207 = 592,641
Calculate Kate Spade's total square footage in FY 2024: 2949 x 197 = 580,953
Calculate Stuart Weitzman's total square footage in FY 2022: 1,919 x 39 = 74,841
Calculate Stuart Weitzman's total square footage in FY 2024: 1,938 x 34 = 65,892
Calculate the difference in total square footage between FY 2022 and FY 2024 for Coach: 1,589,220 - 1,659,777 = - 70,557
Calculate the difference in total square footage between FY 2022 and FY 2024 for Kate Spade: 580,953 - 592,641 = -11,688
Calculate the difference in total square footage between FY 2022 and FY 2024 for Stuart Weitzman: 65,892 - 74,841 = -8,949

Identify Stuart Weitzman as the brand with the greatest growth in total square footage from FY 2022 to FY 2024. While none of the brands saw growth because they all faced a decline in total square footage, Stuart Weitzman experienced the least decline.
